caption.p: Inhibitory activities by compound ( a) 1, ( b) 2 and ( c) 4 in both the accumulation (left) using 3 replicates (coefficient of variation, cv < 1) and biofilm formation (right ) using 6 replicates ( p-value < 0.01) assays. Blue line: verapamil (0.5 × MIC)—A—negative control; Red line: chlorpromazine 0.5 × MIC—B—DMSO; Green line: compound with no known activity (0.5 × MIC)—C—0.5 × MIC; Purple line: compound tested for activity (0.5 × MIC); Black line: drug-free control.
